You may have heard about the "monstrously fast" (http://gizmodo.com/inside-the-tech-behind-new-yorks-monstrou...), "obscenely fast" (http://gizmodo.com/nycs-new-public-wifi-is-obscenely-fast-17...) free public wifi we're installing all over New York City. Come help us make it even better.

But that's not all we do. We create products and experiences that use technology to make shared spaces amazing. Full set of job postings here: https://boards.greenhouse.io/intersection
